Rotation.RotationList: All: General Functions|All: Event Functions|All: Event Loader|Boss: Heroic Will|All: Return to Form|All: Rebirth Mouseover|--- offensive spells ---|All: Start Attack|Cat: Feral Charge|Cat: Cancel Tiger's Fury|Cat: Faerie Fire (Feral)|Cat: Ravage|Cat: Mangle (No Debuff)|Cat: Tiger's Fury|Cat: Rip|Cat: Ferocious Bite Refresh|Cat: Rake|Cat: Savage Roar|Cat: Ferocious Bite Filler|Cat: Energy Pause|Cat: Shred|Cat: Mangle
Rotation.RotationNotes:
This profile does NOT manage your berserk. You should use your Berserk when you want to use it!
Hold SHIFT over a dead player's unit frame to Battle Rez them then return to your previous form. Hold ALT to prevent yourself from clicking for Hour of Twilight.
